General.Name: China Aerospace International Holdings Limited
General.Description: China Aerospace International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates hi-tech manufacturing and aerospace service business in Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, and internationally. The company offers plastic products, liquid crystal display, printed circuit boards, and intelligent chargers, as well as invests in industrial property. It also distributes plastic and metal, and molds and packing products; engages in electroplating of metals; and provides property management and treasury services. The company was incorporated in 1975 and is based in Hung Hom, Hong Kong.
General.Address: One Harbourfront, Hung Hom, Hong Kong

7.Name: Mr. Jianhua  Xu L.L.B., L.L.M., LLB, LLM, M.B.A., MBA
